date: The date on which the solution was obtained/made public in format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

publication.title: A title of any publication that may be associated to the solution.
publication.doi: The DOI linking to the publication.

objective.value: A float describing the value of the objective function that the solution achieved.
objective.unit: A string of the unit in which the quality is measured.
objective.description: A description of how quality is measured.
objective.metadata: A free form dictionary to include additional metrics and information.

approximation ratio.value: A float describing the value of the objective function that the solution achieved.
approximation ratio.unit: A string of the unit in which the quality is measured.
approximation ratio.description: A description of how quality is measured.
approximation ratio.metadata: A free form dictionary to include additional metrics and information.

time-to-solution.value: A float which gives the time it took to find the solution.
time-to-solution.unit: A string of the unit in which the time-to-solution is given. This should ideally be 's' to indicate seconds.
time-to-solution.description: A description of how time-to-solution is measured.
time-to-solution.metadata: A free form dictionary to include additional metrics and information.

cost-of-solution.value: A float which gives the cost of the solution.
cost-of-solution.unit: A string of the unit in which the cost-of-solution is given.
cost-of-solution.description: A description of how cost-of-solution is measured.
cost-of-solution.metadata: A free form dictionary to include additional metrics and information.
